name: Primeau Productions
tag_list: ed-primeau, video-production, audio-production, social-media-marketing, internet-marketing, digital-media, publishing-, multi-media-publishing, consulting, creative-web-development, seo, content-development
overview: Primeau Productions, Inc is a full service digital publishing and marketing company that specializes in audio and video production and distribution, creative web-development and social media marketing strategies. They focus on using multimedia platforms for custom designed Internet marketing campaigns. They provide services such as multimedia content creation and distribution, integrated marketing campaigns with a focus on web 2.0, interactive and engaging content development and organic SEO. Primeau Productions is also a media publishing house ranging from podcast development to book digitization and audio-book publishing. Beyond the direct services and products offered, Primeau Productions also serves as a coaching and consulting firm focusing on digital marketing development, video/audio production and social media marketing. Primeau Productions also maintains a podcast and information resource regarding online video called “The Video Revolution”.
